Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express Temporary Northbound Reroute near 47th/Lake Shore Drive
ShortDescription: NB 6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, Cottage Grove, Oakwood and Lake Shore Drive due to, street blockage near 47th/Lake Shore Dr.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, Cottage Grove, Oakwood and Lake Shore Drive due to, street blockage near 47th/Lake Shore Dr.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Reroute near 71st/Cregier
ShortDescription: 71 71st/South Shore buses temp. rerouted NB: 71st, Jeffery, 67th, Stony Island & 71st; SB:  71st, Stony Island, 73rd, Exchange & 71st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near 71st/Cregier.

Northbound buses will operate via 71st, Jeffery, 67th, Stony Island and 71st.

Southbound buses will operate via 71st, Stony Island, 73rd, Exchange and 71st.

Allow extra travel time.
